unittitle_ssm: Alice G. Fell Brooklyn and New York City theatre programs collection
abstract_ssm: The collection consists of a scrapbook (1900-1929) and loose programs (circa 1910-1956) of Brooklyn and New York City theater productions. In addition to musical and theatrical programs, it includes a small amount of programs for dinners and special events.
